message_1: A company producing chocolates wants to test the effects of various flavors on the preference of customers. They randomly selected a sample of 50 people and divided them into five groups of 10. Each group was given a different flavor of chocolate to taste and rate on a scale of 1 to 10. Find the mean and standard deviation of the ratings for each flavor.
message_2: To find the mean and standard deviation of the ratings for each flavor, we need the data for the ratings given by the customers for each flavor. Please provide the ratings for each group.
